name: CryptHack
description:
Hi! This is a demo you can try out for my game.
There's currently some problems with it that impede development at the moment- things I need to think about.
I really hope I won't have to scrap what I have and start from scratch with it, but I might.

Enjoy 0.1.0!

Play with WASD to move, space to jump, mouse to look, tab to unlock the cursor, escape to quit.
